name: Dragon Slayer (itch) (lachdigger)
description:
Made using the Unity Game Engine this pixel art game consists of 8 different levels for the player to complete each requiring the player to complete a certain task whether that be fighting off Groups of enemy's or finding your way out of a labyrinth of caves. Each level will also be timed and recorded on the main menu allowing for the player to compare and strive to achieve a faster time.

Disclaimer: If your playing on a laptop the some graphics may appear small so a fix for that as well will be coming out soon.
